## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G15480](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G15480)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MAZ1</u>
- **Gene Name:** MALE FERTILITY-ASSOCIATED ZINC FINGER PROTEIN 1
- **Description:**   C2H2-type zinc finger family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_045186]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Male sterile. Abnormal pollen development.
